meanings.definition: The act of making something sentimental.
meanings.sent1: Her sentimentalizations of old photographs always bring tears to my eyes.
meanings.sent2: The sentimentalizations in the movie made it a heartwarming experience for the audience.
meanings.sent3: His constant sentimentalizations of his childhood toys can be quite endearing.
meanings.sent4: The artist's sentimentalizations of nature in her paintings evoke a sense of nostalgia.
meanings.sent5: The sentimentalizations in the song captured the essence of lost love perfectly.

meanings.definition: The process of imbuing something with sentimental qualities.
meanings.sent1: The sentimentalizations of the gift made it even more special to her.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the sentimentalizations of the story that added depth to the characters.
meanings.sent3: The sentimentalizations of the family heirloom turned it into a cherished treasure.
meanings.sent4: His sentimentalizations of the old watch gave it a new life and meaning.
meanings.sent5: The sentimentalizations of the place brought back fond memories of childhood.
